entry.title: 量子力学笔记（三）
entry.content:
Hilbert Space

  • The state of a system is represented by its wave function, observables are represented by operators

  • Wave functions live in Hilbert space

    • the set of all square-integrable functions

      • ∫ab∣f(x)∣2dx\int_a^b|f(x)|^2dx∫ab​∣f(x)∣2dx
      • ∫∣Ψ∣2dx=1\int|\Psi|^2dx=1∫∣Ψ∣2dx=1

    • inner product of two functions

      • ⟨f∣g⟩≡∫abf(x)∗g(x)dx\lang f|g\rang \equiv \int_a^b f(x)^*g(x)dx⟨f∣g⟩≡∫ab​f(x)∗g(x)dx

Observables

  • ⟨Q⟩=⟨Ψ∣Q^Ψ⟩\lang Q\rang=\lang\Psi|\hat{Q}\Psi\rang⟨Q⟩=⟨Ψ∣Q^​Ψ⟩

  • Hermitian Operator

    • ⟨f∣Q^g⟩=⟨Q^f∣g⟩\left \langle f|\hat{Q}g\right \rangle=\left \langle \hat{Q}f|g\right \rangle⟨f∣Q^​g⟩=⟨Q^​f∣g⟩ for all f(x)f(x)f(x) and all g(x)g(x)g(x)

      the outcome of measurement has got be real

    • Observables are represented by hermitian operator

      • Q^=Q^†\hat{Q}=\hat{Q}^\daggerQ^​=Q^​†

  • Determinate States

    • Determinate states of QQQ are eigenfunctions of Q^\hat{Q}Q^​
      • Q^Ψ=qΨ\hat{Q}\Psi=q\PsiQ^​Ψ=qΨ

Eigenfunctions Of A Hermitian Operator

  • Discrete Spectra

    • Theorem1: Their eigenvalues are real

    • Theorem2: Eigenfunctions belonging to distinct eigenvalues are orthogonal

      • for degenerate state, we can use the Gram-Schmidt orthogonalization proedure to construct orthogonal eigenfunctions within each degenerate space

    • Axiom: The eigenfunctions of an observable operator are complete

  • Continuous Spectra

    • 基矢间的关系、态函数向基矢投影得到系数
  • Discrete SpectraContinuous Spectra
    <f∣f>=∫ab∣f(x)∣2dx<f\mid f>=\int_a^b\mid f(x)\mid^2dx<f∣f>=∫ab​∣f(x)∣2dx
    <fm∣fn>=δmn<f_m\mid f_n>=\delta_{mn}<fm​∣fn​>=δmn​<fp′∣fp>=δ(p−p′)<f_{p'}\mid f_p>=\delta(p-p')<fp′​∣fp​>=δ(p−p′)
    f(x)=∑n=1∞cnfn(x)f(x)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infin}c_nf_n(x)f(x)=∑n=1∞​cn​fn​(x)f(x)=∫−∞∞c(p)fp(x)dpf(x)=\int_{-\infin}^{\infin}c(p)f_p(x)dpf(x)=∫−∞∞​c(p)fp​(x)dp
    cn=<fn∣f>c_n=<f_n\mid f>cn​=<fn​∣f>cp′=<fp′∣f>c_{p'}=<f_{p'}\mid f>cp′​=<fp′​∣f>

Generalized Statistical Interpretation

  • If you measure an observable Q(x,p)Q(x,p)Q(x,p) on a particle in the state Ψ(x,t)\Psi(x,t)Ψ(x,t), you are certain to get one of the eigenvalues of the hermitian operator Q^(x,−iℏd/dx)\hat{Q}(x,-i\hbar d/dx)Q^​(x,−iℏd/dx)
    • If the spectrum of Q^\hat{Q}Q^​ is discrete, the probability of getting the particular eigenvalues qnq_nqn​ associated with the (orthonormalized) eigenfunctions fn(x)f_n(x)fn​(x) is
      • $|c_n|^2 $ where cn=⟨fn∣Ψ⟩c_n=\lang f_n|\Psi\rangcn​=⟨fn​∣Ψ⟩
    • If the spectrum of Q^\hat{Q}Q^​ is continuous, with real eigenvalues q(z)q(z)q(z) and associated (Dirac-orthonormalized) eigenfunctions fz(x)f_z(x)fz​(x), the probability of getting a result in the range dzdzdz is
      • $|c(z)|^2dz $ where c(z)=⟨fz∣Ψ⟩c(z)=\lang f_z|\Psi\rangc(z)=⟨fz​∣Ψ⟩
      • Ψ(y,t)=⟨gy∣Ψ⟩\Psi(y,t)=\lang g_y|\Psi\rangΨ(y,t)=⟨gy​∣Ψ⟩
      • Φ(p,t)=⟨fp∣Ψ⟩\Phi(p,t)=\lang f_p|\Psi\rangΦ(p,t)=⟨fp​∣Ψ⟩
      • 能否根据归一化得出∫∣c(z)∣2dz=1\int|c(z)|^2dz=1∫∣c(z)∣2dz=1

The Uncertainty Principle

  • σA2σB2≥(12i⟨[A^,B^]⟩)2\sigma_A^2\sigma_B^2\ge(\frac{1}{2i}\langle [\hat A, \hat B]\rangle)^2σA2​σB2​≥(2i1​⟨[A^,B^]⟩)2

    • the commutator of two hermitian operators is itself anti-hermitian(Q^†=−Q^)(\hat{Q}^\dagger=-\hat{Q})(Q^​†=−Q^​), and its expectation value is imaginary

  • incompatible observables

    • observables whose operators do not commute

    • do not have shared eigenfunctions

  • The Minimum-Uncertainty Wave Packet

    • g(x)=iaf(x)g(x)=iaf(x)g(x)=iaf(x), where aaa is real

      • 不等号成立的条件

    • (A^−⟨A⟩)Ψ=ia(B^−⟨B⟩)(\hat{A}-\langle A\rangle)\Psi=ia(\hat{B}-\langle B\rangle)(A^−⟨A⟩)Ψ=ia(B^−⟨B⟩)

    • Gaussian wave packet

  • The Energy-Time Uncertainty Principle

    • energy-time uncertainty principle
      • ΔtΔE≥ℏ2\Delta t\Delta E\ge\frac{\hbar}{2}ΔtΔE≥2ℏ​
      • Δt=σQ∣d⟨Q⟩/dt∣\Delta t=\frac{\sigma_Q}{|d\lang Q\rang/dt|}Δt=∣d⟨Q⟩/dt∣σQ​​
    • generalized Ehrenfest theorem
      • ddt⟨Q⟩=iℏ⟨[iH^,Q^]⟩+⟨∂Q^∂t⟩\frac{d}{dt}\lang Q\rang=\frac{i}{\hbar}\lang [\hat{iH},\hat{Q}]\rang+\lang \frac{\partial \hat{Q}}{\partial t}\rangdtd​⟨Q⟩=ℏi​⟨[iH^,Q^​]⟩+⟨∂t∂Q^​​⟩
      • σHσQ≥ℏ2∣d⟨Q⟩dt∣\sigma_H\sigma_Q\ge\frac{\hbar}{2}|\frac{d\lang Q\rang}{dt}|σH​σQ​≥2ℏ​∣dtd⟨Q⟩​∣

Vectors and Operators

  • Bases in Hilbert Space
    • the wave function is the component in the expansion of ∣S(t)⟩|\mathcal{S}(t)\rang∣S(t)⟩ in the basis of corresponding eigenfunctions
      • Ψ(x,t)=⟨x∣S(t)⟩\Psi(x,t)=\lang x|\mathcal{S}(t)\rangΨ(x,t)=⟨x∣S(t)⟩
      • Φ(p,t)=⟨p∣S(t)⟩\Phi(p,t)=\lang p|\mathcal{S}(t)\rangΦ(p,t)=⟨p∣S(t)⟩
      • cn(t)=⟨n∣S(t)⟩c_n(t)=\lang n|\mathcal{S}(t)\rangcn​(t)=⟨n∣S(t)⟩
    • linear combination
      • ∣S(t)⟩=∫Ψ(y,t)δ(x−y)dy=∫Φ(p,t)12πℏeipx/ℏdp=∑cne−iEnt/ℏψn(x)|\mathcal{S}(t)\rang=\int\Psi(y,t)\delta(x-y)dy=\int\Phi(p,t)\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\hbar}}e^{ipx/\hbar}dp=\sum c_ne^{-iE_nt/\hbar\psi_n(x)}∣S(t)⟩=∫Ψ(y,t)δ(x−y)dy=∫Φ(p,t)2πℏ​1​eipx/ℏdp=∑cn​e−iEn​t/ℏψn​(x)
      • in position space, x^−x\hat{x}-xx^−x, ∣x⟩−δ(x−y)|x\rang-\delta(x-y)∣x⟩−δ(x−y), component−Ψ(x,t)component-\Psi(x,t)component−Ψ(x,t), S(t)−Ψ(x,t)\mathcal{S}(t)-\Psi(x,t)S(t)−Ψ(x,t)
      • ∣S(t)⟩|\mathcal{S}(t)\rang∣S(t)⟩大概就是一个抽象的态，在不同空间表示不同
    • operators (representing observables) are linear transformations on Hilbert space
      • ⟨em∣Q^∣en⟩≡Qmn\lang e_m|\hat{Q}|e_n\rang\equiv Q_{mn}⟨em​∣Q^​∣en​⟩≡Qmn​
      • bm=∑nQmnanb_m=\sum_nQ_{mn}a_nbm​=∑n​Qmn​an​
    • operators look different when expressed in different bases
      • x^={xiℏ∂/∂p\hat{x}=\left\{\begin{matrix} x \\ i\hbar\partial/\partial p \end{matrix}\right.x^={xiℏ∂/∂p​
      • p^={−iℏ∂/∂xp\hat{p}=\left\{\begin{matrix} -i\hbar\partial/\partial x \\ p \end{matrix}\right.p^​={−iℏ∂/∂xp​
    • actually, some systems admit only a finite number NNN of linearly independent states
  • Dirac Notation
    • bra and ket
      • ⟨f∣=∫f∗[…]dx\lang f|=\int f^*[…]dx⟨f∣=∫f∗[…]dx
      • ⟨α∣→(a1∗a2∗…an∗)\lang\alpha|\to(a_1^*a_2^*…a_n^*)⟨α∣→(a1∗​a2∗​…an∗​)
      • dual space
    • operator
      • projection operator
        • P^≡∣α⟩⟨α∣\hat{P}\equiv|\alpha\rang\lang\alpha|P^≡∣α⟩⟨α∣
        • idempotent: P^2=P^\hat{P}^2=\hat{P}P^2=P^
      • identity operator (completeness)
        • ∑n∣en⟩⟨en∣=1\sum_n|e_n\rang\lang e_n|=1∑n​∣en​⟩⟨en​∣=1
        • ∫∣ez⟩⟨ez∣dz=1\int|e_z\rang\lang e_z|dz=1∫∣ez​⟩⟨ez​∣dz=1
      • spectral decomposition
        • Q^=∑nqn∣en⟩⟨en∣\hat{Q}=\sum_nq_n|e_n\rang\lang e_n|Q^​=∑n​qn​∣en​⟩⟨en​∣
      • functions of operators
        • f(Q^)=∑nf(qn)∣en⟩⟨en∣f(\hat{Q})=\sum_nf(q_n)|e_n\rang\lang e_n|f(Q^​)=∑n​f(qn​)∣en​⟩⟨en​∣
        • eQ^≡1+Q^+12Q^2+13!Q^3+…e^{\hat{Q}}\equiv1+\hat{Q}+\frac{1}{2}\hat{Q}^2+\frac{1}{3!}\hat{Q}^3+…eQ^​≡1+Q^​+21​Q^​2+3!1​Q^​3+…
        • 11−Q^≡1+Q^+Q^2+Q^3+Q^4+…\frac{1}{1-\hat{Q}}\equiv1+\hat{Q}+\hat{Q}^2+\hat{Q}^3+\hat{Q}^4+…1−Q^​1​≡1+Q^​+Q^​2+Q^​3+Q^​4+…
        • ln(1+Q^)≡Q^−12Q^2+13Q^3−14Q^4+…ln(1+\hat{Q})\equiv\hat{Q}-\frac{1}{2}\hat{Q}^2+\frac{1}{3}\hat{Q}^3-\frac{1}{4}\hat{Q}^4+…ln(1+Q^​)≡Q^​−21​Q^​2+31​Q^​3−41​Q^​4+…
      • Changing Bases In Dirac Notation
        • 利用恒等算符方便换基底

希尔伯特空间、内积、算符、基矢、系数

entry.title: 量子力学笔记（零）

entry.title: 搭建博客中用到的网址
entry.content:
nodejs中文网：Node.js 中文网 (nodejs.cn)

nodejs安装教程：

git官网：Git (git-scm.com)

git安装教程：

git版本控制：浅谈使用git进行版本控制 - 战争热诚 - 博客园 (cnblogs.com)

hexo官网（含官方教程）：Hexo

Butterfly官方教程：Butterfly - A Simple and Card UI Design theme for Hexo

Butterfly教程：卷二兔的个人空间_哔哩哔哩_bilibili

Markdown教程：简介 (shd101wyy.github.io)

用Markdown实现按钮：Kibana：如何在 Markdown 中创建一个 button

搜图网站1：HD/4K/5K Resolution Wallpapers/Backgrounds ▪ Wallroom.io

搜图网站2：免费素材图片 · Pexels

icon网站：https://fontawesome.com/v5.15/icons?d=gallery&p=2

在线渐变色彩搭配网站：https://uigradients.com/

entry.title: Gulp压缩
entry.content:
官方网站

Gulp中文网：https://www.gulpjs.com.cn/

检查node、npm和npx是否正确安装

安装Gulp

先安装gulp命令行工具

运行成功后PowerShell显示内容如下

再安装gulp，g是global的简写

插件安装

压缩HTML

使用gulp-htmlclean和gulp-html-minifier-terser来压缩HTML

压缩CSS

使用gulp-clean-css来压缩CSS

压缩JS

由于Butterfly主题中的JS使用了部分ES6语法，因此不能值使用gulp-uglify来压缩，还需要gulp-babel

压缩图片

使用gulp-imagemin来压缩图片

创建gulpfile文件

运行

修改package.json中"server": "hexo server"为"server": "hexo clean && hexo generate && gulp && hexo server"
执行命令行

entry.title: Kibana的安装教程
entry.content:
1.下载并解压

Kibana官方下载网站：Download Kibana Free | Get Started Now | Elastic

由于本人使用的是Windows系统，直接选择Windows平台并下载相应的zip文件。下载完zip文件后可以解压到你想放置的位置，我个人是将其放到了D盘。

2. Kibana的配置

找到config文件夹中的kibana.yml文件，用编辑器打开，我这里选用的是vscode。

3. 运行Kibana

4. 打开Kibana

5. 深入学习Kibana

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
